Markdown metadata.description: Add default metadata to your markdown file

Markdown 2 Column Table.description: Add two column table with alignment options.

Markdown 3 Column Table.description: Add three column table with alignment options.

Markdown 4 Column Table.description: Add four column table with alignment options.

Markdown tip.description: Add a tip block to your markdown

Markdown warning.description: Add a warning block to your markdown

Markdown caution.description: Add a warning block to your markdown

Markdown note.description: Add a warning block to your markdown

Markdown include.description: Re-use content from other markdown files. Add the relative path to another markdown files in `file` paramter.
